eu.morfeoproject.fast.catalogue.cache
Class SimpleCache<T>

java.lang.Object
  eu.morfeoproject.fast.catalogue.cache.SimpleCache<T>

public class SimpleCache<T>
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides a very simple implementation of an object cache.

Author:
Ismael Rivera

Constructor Summary
SimpleCache()
          Constructs the cache with a default expiration time for the objects of 100 seconds.
SimpleCache(long defaultExpire)
          Construct a cache with a custom expiration date for the objects.
